00026 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 ItemAddCommand::ItemAddCommand(DiagramColumn* column, QGraphicsItem* item,
00028                                QUndoCommand* parent) : QUndoCommand(parent), item_(item),
00029                                                        column_(column), del_(false)
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00033 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 // Function: ~ItemAddCommand()
00035 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 ItemAddCommand::~ItemAddCommand()
00037 {
00038     if (del_)
00039     {
00040         delete item_;
00041     }
00042 }
00043 
00044 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 // Function: undo()
00046 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 void ItemAddCommand::undo()
00048 {
00049     // Remove the item from the column and the scene.
00050     column_->removeItem(item_);
00051     column_->scene()->removeItem(item_);
00052     del_ = true;
00053 
00054         if (item_->type() == DiagramComponent::Type)
00055                 emit componentInstanceRemoved(static_cast<DiagramComponent*>(item_));
00056 
00057     // Execute child commands.
00058     QUndoCommand::undo();
00059 }
00060 
00061 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 // Function: redo()
00063 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 void ItemAddCommand::redo()
00065 {
00066     // Add the item to the column.
00067     column_->addItem(item_);
00068     del_ = false;
00069 
00070         if (item_->type() == DiagramComponent::Type)
00071                 emit componentInstantiated(static_cast<DiagramComponent*>(item_));
00072 
00073     // Child commands need not be executed because the other items change their position
00074     // in a deterministic way.
00075     //QUndoCommand::redo();
00076 }
00077

00100 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 // Function: undo()
00102 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 void PortAddCommand::undo()
00104 {
00105     Q_ASSERT(port_ != 0);
00106 
00107     // Remove the port from the component and from the scene
00108     component_->removePort(port_);
00109     scene_->removeItem(port_);
00110     del_ = true;
00111 
00112     // Execute child commands.
00113     QUndoCommand::undo();
00114 }
00115 
00116 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00117 // Function: redo()
00118 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00119 void PortAddCommand::redo()
00120 {
00121     // Add a port to the component.
00122     if (port_ == 0)
00123     {
00124         port_ = component_->addPort(pos_);
00125     }
00126     else
00127     {
00128         component_->addPort(port_);
00129     }
00130 
00131     del_ = false;
00132 
00133     // Child commands need not be executed because the other ports change their position
00134     // in a deterministic way.
00135     //QUndoCommand::redo();
00136 }

00161 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 // Function: undo()
00163 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00164 void ColumnAddCommand::undo()
00165 {
00166     Q_ASSERT(column_ != 0);
00167 
00168     // Remove the column from the layout.
00169     layout_->removeColumn(column_);
00170     del_ = true;
00171 }
00172 
00173 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00174 // Function: redo()
00175 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00176 void ColumnAddCommand::redo()
00177 {
00178     // If this is the first time, create the column.
00179     if (column_ == 0)
00180     {
00181         layout_->addColumn(name_, contentType_, allowedItems_);
00182         column_ = layout_->getColumns().back();
00183     }
00184     else
00185     {
00186         // Otherwise add the existing column to the layout.
00187         layout_->addColumn(column_);
00188     }
00189 
00190     del_ = false;
00191 }

00193 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00194 // Function: ConnectionAddCommand()
00195 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00196 ConnectionAddCommand::ConnectionAddCommand(QGraphicsScene* scene, DiagramInterconnection* conn,
00197                                            QUndoCommand* parent) : QUndoCommand(parent),
00198                                                                    conn_(conn), mode1_(General::MASTER),
00199                                                                    mode2_(General::MASTER),
00200                                                                    portMaps_(), scene_(scene),
00201                                                                    del_(false)
00202                                                                    
00203 {
00204     QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf1 = conn_->endPoint1()->getBusInterface();
00205     QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf2 = conn_->endPoint2()->getBusInterface();
00206 
00207     if (busIf1 != 0 && busIf1->getBusType().isValid())
00208     {
00209         mode1_ = busIf1->getInterfaceMode();
00210 
00211         if (conn_->endPoint1()->isHierarchical())
00212         {
00213             portMaps_ = busIf1->getPortMaps();
00214         }
00215     }
00216 
00217     if (busIf2 != 0 && busIf2->getBusType().isValid())
00218     {
00219         mode2_ = busIf2->getInterfaceMode();
00220 
00221         if (conn_->endPoint2()->isHierarchical())
00222         {
00223             portMaps_ = busIf2->getPortMaps();
00224         }
00225     }
00226 }

00239 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00240 // Function: undo()
00241 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00242 void ConnectionAddCommand::undo()
00243 {
00244     // Remove the interconnection from the scene.
00245     scene_->removeItem(conn_);
00246 
00247     // Disconnect the ends.
00248     conn_->disconnectEnds();
00249     del_ = true;
00250 }
00251 
00252 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00253 // Function: redo()
00254 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00255 void ConnectionAddCommand::redo()
00256 {
00257     // Add the back to the scene.
00258     if (!scene_->items().contains(conn_))
00259     {
00260         scene_->addItem(conn_);
00261     }
00262 
00263     // Connect the ends and set the interface modes and port map for the hierarchical end point.
00264     if (conn_->connectEnds())
00265     {
00266         QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf1 = conn_->endPoint1()->getBusInterface();
00267         QSharedPointer<BusInterface> busIf2 = conn_->endPoint2()->getBusInterface();
00268 
00269         if (busIf1 != 0 && busIf1->getBusType().isValid())
00270         {
00271             busIf1->setInterfaceMode(mode1_);
00272 
00273             if (conn_->endPoint1()->isHierarchical())
00274             {
00275                 busIf1->setPortMaps(portMaps_);
00276             }
00277 
00278             conn_->endPoint1()->updateInterface();
00279         }
00280 
00281         if (busIf2 != 0 && busIf2->getBusType().isValid())
00282         {
00283             busIf2->setInterfaceMode(mode2_);
00284 
00285             if (conn_->endPoint2()->isHierarchical())
00286             {
00287                 busIf2->setPortMaps(portMaps_);
00288             }
00289 
00290             conn_->endPoint2()->updateInterface();
00291         }
00292     }
00293 
00294     del_ = false;
00295 }
